article_title: Russians Brace for Higher Food Bills
article_text:
MOSCOW—Russia's sudden ban on an array of European and North American food imports catapulted its domestic market into uncertainty Friday, raising the prospect of even-higher prices for Russians already battling climbing grocery and restaurant bills.

The yearlong import ban—which the Russian government imposed Thursday in response to Western sanctions over the crisis in Ukraine—bars imports of beef, pork, poultry, seafood, fruit,...
